attributes.action: give a fulll apology for leaving Margaret Thatchers name off the "Women in Power" list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent government fact sheet from the Equalities office, detailing the achievements of women in politics, missed Margaret Thatcher off the list. As the first female Prime Minister she un-doubtedly deserved to be named personally, as ALL other women on the list were. This is petty party politics at its worst; suppressing history. Gordon Brown or Harriet Harman should publicly apologize for this mistake, and that is what we want to see.
